Gerindra Luruskan Beda Pendapat Dahnil-Prabowo soal Gaji Menhan
01 Nov 2019, 07:47 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - Partai Gerindra angkat bicara terkait perbedaan pendapat antara Menteri Pertahanan (Menhan) Prabowo Subianto dengan juru bicaranya Dahnil Anzar Simanjuntak terkait gaji menhan. Gerindra menyebut keduanya memiliki maksud yang sama.
Wakil Ketua Umum Partai Gerindra Sufmi Dasco Ahmad mengatakan pernyataan Dahnil terkait Prabowo yang tidak ingin terima gaji tidak salah. Dahnil menurutnya bermaksud menjelaskan kalau Prabowo menerima gaji bukan untuk keperluan pribadi.
"Kedua-duanya sama betul, Pak Dahnil dalam statementnya Pak Prabowo tidak menerima gaji artinya gajinya itu tidak dipakai dalam keperluan pribadi, sama dengan Pak Prabowo, Pak Prabowo itu (bilang) gaji diterima," ujar Dasco saat dikonfirmasi, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Dia mengatakan Prabowo tetap akan menandatangani penerimaan gaji. Namun, Prabowo kata Dasco tidak akan menggunakan gajinya itu.
"Gaji diterima, kan aturannya dia harus tanda tangan penerimaan gaji, tapi kemudian setelah gaji diterima ya akan disalurkan bukan untuk keperluan pribadi, kira-kira begitu," ucapnya.

Gerindra Straightens the Difference between Dahnil-Prabowo's opinion about the Defense Minister's salary
Nov 01 2019, 07:47 by Eva Safitri
Jakarta - Gerindra Party spoke out regarding differences of opinion between Defense Minister (Defense) Prabowo Subianto and his spokesman Dahnil Anzar Simanjuntak regarding the defense minister's salary. Gerindra said they both had the same intention.
Deputy Chairman of the Gerindra Party Sufmi Dasco Ahmad said Dahnil's statement related to Prabowo who did not want to receive a salary was not wrong. Dahnil said that he intended to explain that Prabowo did not receive salary for personal needs.
"Both are exactly the same, Mr. Dahnil in his statement Mr. Prabowo did not receive a salary meaning his salary was not used for personal needs, the same as Mr. Prabowo, Mr. Prabowo (said) the salary was received," Dasco said when confirmed, Friday (1/11 / 2019).
He said Prabowo would still sign the salary receipt. However, Prabowo said Dasco would not use his salary.
"Salary is received, the rule is that he must sign the salary receipt, but then after the salary is received, it will not be distributed for personal use, roughly so," he said.
